Thu, 5 Jul 2007

I went into this bait as a military operation, anticipating Desert Storm but what I got was Pearl Harbor.Late in the scam, in an apparent attempt to isolate Lewd from Barrister Dada, the evil c*******r (don't try counting the asterisks to figure out what I called him; I intentionally left one out to make this impossible) reports ME to Yahoo as a scammer and has my mailbox shut down! Other baits in their infancy lost! Contacts lost! And just a major all around pain in the ass to have to sprinkle my name around the web again. Oh, the humanity!

So I have to give this one to the General, lowlife dirty fighter though he may be. He gave as good as he got.

I was able to recover the abuse letter that he sent to Yahoo. He sent it from one of the addresses he used to write as Lewd but he used the same password he gave me to use with the mail addresses he set up for me. I found his email to Yahoo in the 'Sent' file.

Negotiations with Yahoo continue....

<gen.aliyumohammed@frcn.security.gov.ng> 
X-Originating-IP:   
Fri, 22 Jun 2007 
PLEASE YOUR URGENT REPLY IS NEEDED.  
OFFICE OF THE NATIONAL SECURITY ADVISER TO THE PRESIDENT  
FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA  
GET BACK TO ME AT YOUR EARLIEST CONVINIENCE  
Dear,  
I am Lt. Gen.ALIYU MOHAMMED, National Security Adviser to President UMAR MUSA Y'AR ADUA of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. I decided to contact you because of the prevailing security report reaching my office and the intense nature of policy in Nigeria.This is to inform you about our plan to send four packages containing the total sum of US$10. Million to you as your fund through courier delivery. This system will be easier and secured for you and for us.
  
Note: The money is coming on 4 security proof boxes. The boxes are sealed with synthetic nylon seal and padded with machine. This packages has been lying hear since the PRESIDENT OLUSEGUN OBASANJO led government.I was however notifyed of the content by the manager of the bank that packaged the fund,to be sneeked out of the shores of nigeria by some top government offiocials before the hand over.I will use my position as the National Security Adviser to the President to send this fund to you.
  
Please you don't have to worry for any thing I will pay the delivery charges for the packages to be delivered to your resident,but we have to reach an agreement on how the money will be shared.it will be diveded into three 50% for me,10% for the the bank managerand 40% for you.And the shareing will be after we have deducted what so ever it cost us finnance these transaction.  

The boxes are coming with a Diplomatic agent who will accompany the boxes to your house address. All you need to do now Is to send to me your full house address and your identity such as, Your Name Your Address Your contact phone Number/fax number international passport or driver license
  
The Diplomatic attached will travel with it. He will call you immediately he arrives your country's airport. I hope you understand me. Please don't send money to any body in Nigeria. Be warned. I will let you know when the special Grace of God will airlift the boxes.
  
Note: The diplomatic does not know the original contents of the boxes. What l declared to them as the contents is Sensitive Photographic Film Material.I did not declare money to them please. If they call you and ask you the contents please tell them the same thing Ok,i will let you know how far I have gone with the arrangement. I will secure the Diplomatic immunity clearance certificate that will be tagged on the boxes to make it stand as a diplomatic consignment.This clearance will make it pass every custom checkpoint all over the world without hitch. Confirm the receipt of this message and send the requirements to me immediately you receive this message.
  
If you need more information about this, i will give you the contact of the diplomatic agents for more information on how to carry out the plan. Please I need urgent reply because the boxes are schedule to leave as soon as I hear from you. Reply me immediately you receive this message via my private e-mail.  

Best Regards,  
Lt. Gen.ALIYU MOHAMMED  
National Security Adviser to the President  
Federal Republic of Nigeria

Lewis D. Noogie

General Mohammed, 
This is getting way too complicated. I don't know what in the hell is going on anymore. 
The attorney that I heard from is not the first guy, Obinna, his last name is Dada. He wrote me yesterday to tell me that there had been some confusion and that there are indeed 4 boxes with $10 million and that they had been sent to Benin under your instructions. I presume you know this guy but his email address is iamindada@yahoo.com. He tells me now that the money is still in Benin with Global Express but he is in Lagos. Now you're telling me that the money is in Nigeria. Can you understand how this might be a little confusing for me?
  
There's something else - I heard from the first attorney, Obinna, and he's telling me to send money to him by Western Union. General, Gadyukina is a small, remote village in the Ural mountains of the Russian far east. There is no Western Union here and the nearest one is in Irkutsk which is an 8-hour drive from here. There's no way I can get there before Saturday. I could possibly get there sometime around the middle of next week but if there's a 4-day limit on when we can do this then we have a big problem. I asked Barrister Dada for a bank account that I could do a wire transfer to.
  
So I'm very confused about the logistics of this deal and I'm beginning to think that we're not going to be able to pull this off.  

Lewd

Whenever I work with someone in a business relationship I always insist on honesty and transparency. Integrity is my middle name and I expect the same honesty in response.  

I tried to broach the subject in a roundabout way because I know it's a delicate subject but now I think it's best we drag this out into the sunlight. I promise you that your secret will be safe with me.  
Lewd

messages.body:
July 9, 2007

General Mohammed,  

I'm flattered that you would offer to share your wife with me like that, I really am. I think it takes a man truly confident with himself to make such a gesture. I would, however, like to hold off on accepting your offer until I can get a better idea what she looks like. Assuming she's halfway decent-looking we can work out some kind of time-share arrangement.  

I'm guessing Mr. Dada was mistaken about the sex change thing. Besides, judging from your passport photograph, no amount of surgery would make you even a little attractive as a woman.  

I'm confused on how to proceed. If I send you all the money I have then how are we going to pay for these damned yellow tags? I was going to send Ms. Bushburn to Irkutsk tomorrow to locate a Western Union. If we don't secure the $10 million we might run the risk of losing it to those people who siezed it.
  
What's the best way to do this?  

Lewd

July 19, 2007
, my mugu friend, it looks like you've given up! I am so disappointed in you. You are about the stupidest scammer I have ever dicked with (and I've dicked with some real stupid ones in my time), but at least you hung in there way past any normal mugu would have

I've been leading you around by the nose since I got that first silly letter of yours last month. You've been eating out of my hand the entire time. But every good thing has to come to an end. I have to write this last farewell, though. You see, I always have the last word in these scams, and so I will have it with you.

You need to give some serious thought to finding another profession, dog, 'cause you sure ain't no good at this one. Ever think about a real job? I would suggest that after you recover from your sex-change operation that you start checking the help-wanted adds in the newspaper.

But we had fun, didn't we? 
Well, gotta go. I'm in the middle of a 100% risk free transaction with Charles Soludo and he's waiting for a Western Union control number. Drop me a line and let me know how you're doing sometime.

Your pals, 
Lewd & Idi 
ps - almost forgot - fulk you. And please tell the Reverend Smith (or Mark or whatever the hell his name is) and Barrister Obinna that I said fulk them too.
